pcanvas.draw
Class CanvasPen

java.lang.Object
  pcanvas.draw.CanvasPen
Direct Known Subclasses:
CanvasPen3D
public class CanvasPen
extends java.lang.Object

Various utilities for drawing objects onto a PApplet canvas.

Field Summary
protected  processing.core.PApplet applet
          A PApplet whose canvas this object will manipulate to draw objects onto the screen.
protected  java.lang.Float strokeWeight

Constructor Detail

CanvasPen

public CanvasPen(processing.core.PApplet applet)
Basic constructor. Requires a PApplet in order to invoke its graphics methods.

Parameters:
applet - the applet whose graphics we will be manipulating.

Parameters:
point - a Point to draw onto the canvas.

                      float radius,
                      Colors fillColor)

Parameters:
point - some point to draw.
radius - a radius for the point.
fillColor - the fill color of the point.

drawPoint

                      float radius)
Same as drawPoint(Point point, float radius, Colors fillColor) except the fillColor defaults to Colors.BLACK.

Parameters:
point - a point to be drawn.
radius - a radius for the point.

Parameters:
from - the point to start the vector draw from.
vector - the vector to draw.

                            Vector vector)
Same as drawVector(Point from, Vector vector) except puts a pretty little arrow on top to denote vector direction.

Parameters:
from - the point to start the vector draw from.
vector - the vector to draw.

drawLine

public void drawLine(Point start,
                     Point end)
Draws a line-segment between two Points on the canvas. Defaults the line color to Colors.BLACK.

Parameters:
start - and end point of the line-segment.
end - another end point of the line-segment.

drawLine

public void drawLine(Point start,
                     Point end,
                     Colors color)
Draws a line-segment between two Points on the canvas, coloring it with the provided color.

Parameters:
start - and end point of the line-segment.
end - another end point of the line-segment.
color - the color to make the line-segment.

drawLine

public void drawLine(Point start,
                     Point end,
                     Colors color,
                     float strokeWeight)
Draws a line-segment between two Points on the canvas, coloring it with the provided color and stroke weight.

Parameters:
start - and end point of the line-segment.
end - another end point of the line-segment.
color - the color to make the line-segment.
strokeWeight - the desired weight of the line to be drawn.

drawShape

public void drawShape(Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects. Defaults the fill color of the shape to Colors.BLACK.

Parameters:
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawShape

public void drawShape(Colors fillColor,
                      Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects, filling the shape's color with the provided fillColor.

Parameters:
fillColor - what color to paint the object.
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawShapeNoFill

public void drawShapeNoFill(Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects, filling the shape's color with the provided fillColor. Point colors default to black.

Parameters:
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawShape

public void drawShape(Colors fillColor,
                      Colors pointColor,
                      Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects, filling the shape's color with the provided fillColor.

Parameters:
fillColor - what color to paint the object.
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawShapeNoFill

public void drawShapeNoFill(Colors lineColor,
                            Point... points)

drawShape

public void drawShape(Colors fillColor,
                      boolean drawPoints,
                      Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects, filling the shape's color with the provided fillColor.

Parameters:
fillColor - what color to paint the object.
drawPoints - true -> draw all of the vertices of the shape; false -> just draw the shape.
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawShapeNoFill

public void drawShapeNoFill(Colors shapeColor,
                            boolean drawPoints,
                            Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects, filling the shape's color with the provided fillColor.

Parameters:
shapeColor - what color to paint the lines and points.
drawPoints - true -> draw all of the vertices of the shape; false -> just draw the shape.
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawShapeNoFill

public void drawShapeNoFill(boolean drawPoints,
                            Point... points)
Draws a shape defined by a varying-size array of Point objects, filling the shape's color with the provided fillColor.

Parameters:
drawPoints - true -> draw all of the vertices of the shape; false -> just draw the shape.
points - the points which should make up some shape.

drawPoints

public void drawPoints(Colors fillColor,
                       Point... points)
Draws a given set of Point objects onto the canvas.

Parameters:
fillColor - the color to paint the points.
points - the points to draw onto the canvas.

drawLineSegments

public void drawLineSegments(Colors lineColor,
                             Colors pointColor,
                             Point... points)
Draws a line segment to the canvas using the given line color, point color and set of points.

Parameters:
lineColor - color to draw the line segment.
pointColor - color to make the points.
points - the points that make up the line-segment.

drawLineSegments

public void drawLineSegments(Colors lineColor,
                             Point... points)
Draws a line-segment to the canvas. By default, it does not draw the physical {#link Point objects}.

Parameters:
lineColor - the color of the line to be drawn.
points - the points that make up the line segment.

drawLineSegments

public void drawLineSegments(Colors lineColor,
                             java.lang.Boolean drawPoints,
                             Point... points)
Draws a line-segment to the canvas. Uses the provided lineColor as the color to draw the line-segment,

Parameters:
lineColor - the color of the line to be drawn.
drawPoints - whether or not to draw the points provided.
points - the points to be drawn.

drawLineSegments

public void drawLineSegments(Point... points)
Default line-segment draw. This draws the line-segment with the color Colors.BLACK, and does not draw the physical points.

Parameters:
points - the points which make up the line-segment.

drawCircle

public void drawCircle(Circle2D circle)
Draws a circle on to the canvas.

Parameters:
circle - the circle to draw.

mouseDraggedVector

public Vector mouseDraggedVector()
Creates a Vector which represents the displacement between the current mouse location and the mose recent known previous mouse location.

Returns:
a "mouse-dragged" Vector vector.

dragMouse

public void dragMouse(Point point)
Adds a displacement of the mouse dragged vector to a given point.

Parameters:
point - the Point to add displacement to.

nearestMouseInWindow

public Point nearestMouseInWindow()
Returns a Point representation of the closest point to the current mouse location.

Returns:
a new Point which is the closest point to the mouse, inside the canvas.

canvasCenter

public Point canvasCenter()
Gets the center of the canvas as a Point.

Returns:
the Point center of the canvas.

mouseOnCanvas

public java.lang.Boolean mouseOnCanvas()
Checks to see if the current mouse location is inside the bounds of the canvas.

Returns:
true if the mouse is inside the canvas, else false.

distanceToMouse

public float distanceToMouse(Point point)
Returns the Euclidean distance between the given point and the current moust location.

Parameters:
point - some arbitrary Point.
Returns:
the Euclidean distance between the point and the current mouse loc.

mapCircleTexture

public void mapCircleTexture(Point source,
                             Point destination,
                             processing.core.PImage texture,
                             float radius,
                             float precision)
Maps a circle represented by a source point location on the image to the canvas via a destination point, a radius and a 'precision', or how many slices of PI to use for the circle.

Parameters:
source - a source point with respect to the provided PImage texture.
destination - the point to begin mapping to.
texture - the text to map off of.
radius - how large the mapped texture should appear on the canvas.

setStrokeColor

public void setStrokeColor(Colors color)
Sets the stroke color of the canvas pen to a given Colors object.

Parameters:
color - a color to set the stroke to.

setStrokeWeight

public void setStrokeWeight(float weight)
Sets the stroke weight of the canvas pen to a given number.

Parameters:
weight - a pen stroke weight.

setStrokeColorAndWeight

public void setStrokeColorAndWeight(Colors color,
                                    float weight)
Sets the color and weight of the canvas pen.

Parameters:
color - a Colors object.
weight - a pen weight.

setFillColor

public void setFillColor(Colors color)
Sets the fill color of the canvas paintbrush to a given Colors object.

Parameters:
color - the color to set the canvas paintbrush.
